definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(oral) to write (esp. for a living)/to spell out laboriously on squared paper
to draw a rectangular grid (e.g. of farmland)/to checker

sentences.english: The surface reaction is performed in the grid simulation reactor.
sentences.chinese: 而表面反應通過格子模擬反應器進行。

sentences.english: Yarn-dyed Plaid cotton market began to turn up, but almost no turnover.
sentences.chinese: 色織格子棉布市場開始露面，但成交量幾乎沒有。

sentences.english: The chequered background is a little distracting .
sentences.chinese: 黑白格子的背景是一個小分心。

sentences.english: Phil Hill takes the checkered flag, setting a new race speed record.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾山取格子旗，創下了新的比賽速度的紀錄。

sentences.english: In fact is a pink plaid skirt.
sentences.chinese: 其實就是件粉色的格子裙。

sentences.english: Can have two whole days every week to crawl on the checkers without disturbance.
sentences.chinese: 一個禮拜可以有兩天時間在家踏踏實實地爬格子。

sentences.english: I am taking this grid on my surface given by the u and v directions.
sentences.chinese: 在曲面上取這個格子由u，v方向給出的。

sentences.english: My father often writes. That is his job.
sentences.chinese: 我的爸爸經常“爬格子”，那是他的職業。

sentences.english: Place smaller sticks crosswise to make a lattice effect.
sentences.chinese: 把小一點的棍子交叉，做成格子陣的效果。

sentences.english: Welted hand pockets on plaid side.
The cloth has a chequer pattern.
sentences.chinese: 這塊布有格子花的圖形。

sentences.english: It is a big surprise that this kind of checked overcoat has become a trend.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到這種格子圖案的大衣會靡然成風。

sentences.english: Seven Black Plaid Shorts over the knee, with white and smooth skin.
sentences.chinese: 七分黑格子短褲捲過了膝蓋，露出潔白光滑的肌膚。

sentences.english: Over-embroidered plaids are pleated and cut cross-grain and straight-grain mixed in garments.
sentences.chinese: 繡花格子在服裝中交叉或直布紋混合。

sentences.english: The cottons are meant to be combined with destructured jackets, felts, or hairy glenchecks.
sentences.chinese: 棉也可以與夾克，毛毯，或毛格子呢結合。

sentences.english: As a result, my shoe will no longer appeared tartan shoes.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我的鞋櫃便再也沒有出現過格子花紋的鞋子。

definition: checked pattern/square box character (in Chinese text) indicating illegible character
